step_one_title: 1. Put your Nintendo Switch into RCM mode and plug it in
step_one_desc: Insert the RCM jig, plug your Switch into the computer and turn it all the way off. Then hold the power button while holding the volume up button. This may take some practice. You can use this handy guide on YouTube for assistance.
step_one_sec_desc: When it's plugged in and in RCM mode the app will automatically detect it.
switch_found: A Switch in RCM mode has been found
searching_for_switch: Now searching for a Switch in RCM mode

driver_dialog_msg: On Windows you have to install a driver to talk to the Switch. If you haven't already, make sure to install it now. It's very simple.
no_device_no_dragdrop: Drag 'n' dropping payloads only works when you've got a Switch connected in RCM mode
payload_not_in_drop: No payload was detected in the items dropped into the app
